###Riemannian geometry:
<br>

From [this reference](https://youtu.be/BHKd6-IJgVI).

It deals with intrinsic geometry on surfaces. Transitioning from extrinsic coordinates to intrinsic coordinates at each point on the manifold, results in a basis in the tangent space at each point:

<img src="https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/9312897/31397768-df16a3a2-adb4-11e7-83c5-72ca622fafd9.png" width="500">

As we move differentially along the manifold, the tangent plane changes:

<img src="https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/9312897/31398934-99a12550-adb8-11e7-9c46-ef747a5a3e31.png" width="500">


The change of coordinates between two points


<img src="https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/9312897/31403494-3afa36ea-adc7-11e7-9797-5a1066651355.png" width="500">


will entail a projection orthogonal to
